     Harolds going to need a miracle to get through this race  in  one
     piece Thats where you come in! As the  guardian angel-in-training
     assigned to watch  over Harold  as he  competes in  a  series  of
     increasingly complicated and dangerous obstacle courses, you must
     summon all your otherworldly might to get this hopeless contender
     across the finish line in first place.
